code_value: Questions 1~2  Your father’s car has just been recalled by the car company. Ask your father two questions about the car.</br>Questions 3~4  Your next-door neighbor is walking her new dog in the garden. Ask her two questions about the dog.
Questions 1~2  Your father’s car has just been recalled by the car company. Ask your father two questions about the car.
Questions 3~4  Your next-door neighbor is walking her new dog in the garden. Ask her two questions about the dog.
